channel.title: Christmas Crackers (P-Hats Glitch)
channel.description: when i use a x-mas cracker on somone and it says "The other player got the prize!" they dont really get the prize, help anyone?! Extra Info: when it says i got the prize, i really do get the prize tho

item.title: Christmas Crackers (P-Hats Glitch)
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

i tried using giveItems(i already have that void) and now it says that method cant be given the this type.
then it points to the giveItems thing

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas Crackers (P-Hats Glitch)
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You could revert the ‘Giveitem’ command someone has released for PI and make it ONLY give out that one particular item.

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas Crackers (P-Hats Glitch)
item.dc:creator: @invader1212 invader1212
item.description:
@invader1212 wrote:

hey guys. co-owner here, just so you guys know. all we really need is a code that will add a x-mas party hat to the other players inventory… weve tried this…

} else { sM("The person you pulled the cracker with gets the prize."); PlayerHandler.players[UsedOn].CrackerForMe = true; other.addItem(Item.randomPHat(), 1); }

Read full topic
